abilities.name: Chaos Move
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if your opponent has 3 or fewer Prizes, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon (yours or your opponent's) to another (even if it would Knock Out the other Pokémon). This power can't be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hide in Shadows
attacks.text: Switch Gengar with one of your Benched Pokémon.
